means: [人名] [英格兰人、苏格兰人姓氏] 米克绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“卑恭的，顺从的，仁慈的”(humble,submissive,merciful)

sentence.Network_en: She maintained a kind of meek-ness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她保持着一种温顺的态度。

sentence.Network_en: The meek shall inherit the earth.
They called her Miss Mouse because she was so meek and mild .
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称她为“鼠小姐”，因为她总是那么懦弱谦和。

list.abs: the little girl is as meek as a lamb ., 那个小姑娘像羔羊一般温顺.
Our work will be finished this meek , depend upon it ., 我们的工作将会在这星期完成 , 毫无疑问.
His wife is a very meek woman , like clay in the hands of the potter ., 他的妻子是一个很柔和的女人 , 百依百顺.

a meek inn owner discovers a suitcase floating down and triggers a nightmarish chain of events involving his nagging wife and a strange guest couple .一位温柔的客栈老板发现一个行李箱漂浮下来，由此掀起了一场噩梦般的连锁事件，甚至牵连到他恼人的妻子和一对陌生的顾客夫妇。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English me(o)c (also in the sense 'courteous or indulgent'), from Old Norse mjúkr 'soft, gentle'

entry.def: If you describe a person as meek, you think that they are gentle and quiet, and likely to do what other people say.

example.ex: He was a meek, mild-mannered fellow.
example.tran: 他是一个温顺随和的人。

example.ex: ...the meekest and most docile of people.
example.tran: 众人之中最温顺驯良的一个

means.word_mean: 1. humble in spirit or manner; suggesting retiring mildness or even cowed submissiveness;
3. evidencing little spirit or courage; overly submissive or compliant;

sentences.sentence: "compliant and anxious to suit his opinions of those of others"
"a fine fiery blast against meek conformity"- Orville Prescott
"she looked meek but had the heart of a lion"

auth_sentence.content: Meek or bold, a good beginning achieves clarity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meek or bold, a good beginning achieves clarity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meek or bold, a good beginning achieves clarity.

auth_sentence.content: I am meek and gentle with these butchers!
auth_sentence.res_content: I am meek and gentle with these butchers!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am meek and gentle with these butchers!

auth_sentence.content: He was humble and meek, filled with self-disparagement and abasement.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was humble and meek, filled with self-disparagement and abasement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was humble and meek, filled with self-disparagement and abasement.

sentences.en: She won’t object—she’s so meek and mild.
sentences.cn: 她不会反对的——她是那么顺服温和。
